definition.template: Editions

action.script: var pageFullPath = '/'+((zc.clip.edition.uid_actual) ? zc.clip.edition.uid_actual : zc.clip.edition.uid)+'/'+((zc.clip.edition.sub_sub_category.code)? zc.clip.edition.sub_sub_category.code : zc.clip.edition.sub_category.code) +'/' + zc.clip.edition.date.split('-').reverse().join('-'); pageFullPath = pageFullPath + '/' + ((zc.queryParams.page) ? zc.queryParams.page : 1) + ((zc.clip.edition.sub_sub_category.code) ? '?s='+zc.clip.edition.sub_category.code+'#page/1/1' : '#page/1/1'); zc.actionService.navigateByUrl(pageFullPath)

var whatsAppUrl = 'https://api.whatsapp.com/send?text='; var clipUrl = zc.config.application_url+'/c/'+zc.params.module; if(zc.queryParams.page) {clipUrl = clipUrl + '?page='+zc.queryParams.page;} window.open(whatsAppUrl + clipUrl);

properties.displayFormat: Please use this for epaper related feedback only. For other messages, please write to the newspaper's editor.

actions.script: window._taboola = window._taboola || [];_taboola.push({article:'auto'});!function (e, f, u, i) {if (!document.getElementById(i)){e.async = 1;e.src = u;e.id = i;f.parentNode.insertBefore(e, f);}}(document.createElement('script'),document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],'//cdn.taboola.com/libtrc/andhrajyothy-epaper/loader.js','tb_loader_script');if(window.performance && typeof window.performance.mark == 'function'){window.performance.mark('tbl_ic');}
